column1: Little Goat Diner////Had birthday brunch! This has been added to my 'Must Have' list for my Chicago trips.  The wait was about 30min without a reservation on a Friday afternoon.  It was well worth the wait. I got the French toast
column2: it had a over easy egg in the center with chopped fried chicken.  It was soooo good
column3: however I would recommend getting the BBQ maple syrup on the side
column4: its thin and caused the other slice to get soggy.  My best friend ordered the shrimp and grits
column6: the best I've ever had.  Everything was fresh and full of flavor.  Going back before heading back to AZ!
